issue.title: [IR] Allow typed null literals to be represented
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14173](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14173). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently compute IR is unable to represent a typed null literal.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14173?focusedCommentId=17424070) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11271
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11271>
